sample-document.pdf.text:
This is the first page of a sample document.

It contains some example text that demonstrates how OCR data is structured and how this utility processes it into readable plain-text files.

The text maintains its original formatting and line breaks.

This is the second page of the document.

Each page is processed separately and will be clearly marked with page delimiters in the output file.

This makes it easy to navigate through the extracted content.

Final page of the sample document.

The utility handles multiple documents in a single JSON file, sorts pages correctly, and outputs everything with proper UTF-8 encoding.

End of document.

another-document.pdf.text:
This is a second document to demonstrate processing multiple files.

Each document gets its own output text file based on the original filename.

Second page of the second document.

The utility is designed to handle batch processing of OCR results efficiently.
